list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a level of quality or attainment.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: their restaurant offers a high standard of service
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: nhà hàng của họ cung cấp một tiêu chuẩn dịch vụ cao

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an idea or thing used as a measure, norm, or model in comparative evaluations.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the wages are low by today's standards
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tiền lương thấp theo tiêu chuẩn ngày nay

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a tune or song of established popularity.
a military or ceremonial flag carried on a pole or hoisted on a rope.
a tree or shrub that grows on an erect stem of full height.
an upright water or gas pipe.
used or accepted as normal or average.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the standard rate of income tax
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tỷ lệ thuế thu nhập tiêu chuẩn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a tree or shrub) growing on an erect stem of full height.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: standard trees are useful for situations where immediate height is needed
